# Plan for R Training

## Prior to training:

- [Install R and RStudio](https://posit.co/download/rstudio-desktop/)
- Alternative (if any issues in installation) | [https://posit.cloud/](https://posit.cloud/
)  

## Day 01: May 10th

### Topic 1 | Introduction to R and RStudio

- RStudio Tour
- R Basics | Variables and operators
- R Packages
- Datasets in R
- R Markdown & quarto

### Topic 2 | working with data in R

- Introduction to the `tidyverse`
- `dplyr` | common operations & pipes
- `tidyr` | common data manipulations

## Day 02: May 17th

### Topic 3 | Visualizing data in R
- Introduce the grammar of graphics
- `ggplot2` | making visuals in R
- Customizing visualizations in R
- tables in R

### Topic 4 | Getting comfortable in R

- Putting it all together with a mini case study
  - Cleaning and wrangling data
  - Exploring data
  - Analyzing data
  - Visualizing results
